    Computed identifier of the sample, depending of the mapping mode

    getIdByColumn()
    Computed identifier of the sample, using columns as reference The id is equal to general id in case of random mapping

    Computed identifier of the sample, using rows as reference The id is equal to general id in case of random mapping

    Given the peerID of a node, determine if this sample falls within the region of the node.
    int
    sampleNumberByColumn()
    Sample numbering to map each sample to an integer in the range 1 to SIZE*SIZE Samples are ordered by column
    int
    sampleNumberByRow()
    Sample numbering to map each sample to an integer in the range 1 to SIZE*SIZE Samples are ordered by row
